medical_history.chief_complaint: Growth retardation with craniofacial and limb anomalies.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented at 4 months of age with growth retardation, where her height was measured at 55 cm (3rd percentile) and weight at 4100 g (below the 3rd percentile). Additionally, feeding difficulties were noted due to orofacial malformations, and the patient spent 21 days in the neonatal intensive care unit (NICU). At 5 years old, she exhibited hypernasal speech and other complications.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient's mother had an uncomplicated pregnancy apart from an intrauterine growth retardation detected at 28 weeks. The patient had feeding difficulties due to orofacial malformations and a history of spending time in the NICU.
medical_history.social_history: The patient's mother has no history of alcohol, smoking, or drug abuse.
